title: Patcher screen closes when I click launch, then nothing happens.
body: When I click launch, the patcher screen closes, but no login screen pops up. I've tried everything short of reinstalling League and was wondering if I'll have to do that. I've also had issues elsewhere with flash player, and was wondering if this could be related. Thanks.

replies.body: The client not appearing after selecting launch is usually caused by some security setting that's blocking it from opening.  Give our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide a go to get that access restored.  Let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=sEl3VEkM,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-12T19:25:08.734+0000)
>
> The client not appearing after selecting launch is usually caused by some security setting that's blocking it from opening.  Give our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide a go to get that access restored.  Let me know if you have any questions.

I was able to login finally, although I had to reinstall. Thanks

> [{quoted}](name=Hugless Virgin,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=sEl3VEkM,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-11-13T06:44:49.622+0000)
>
> I was able to login finally, although I had to reinstall. Thanks

Hey, how did you go about with the reinstall?  Did you use HRT or something else?
